original_text: And Nahor lived after he fathered Terah 119 years and had other sons and daughters.
korean_text: 데라를 낳은 후에 백십구 년을 지내며 자녀를 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: And Nahor lived after he fathered Terah 119 years
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나홀은 데라를 낳은 후에 119년을 살았고

sentences.original_text: and had other sons and daughters.
